<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>When you have completed the install of Nuvolo application, verify the following number of components in the instance vs what mentioned in Installation docs of installed scope application :

Tables
Business Rules
Client Scripts
Script Includes
UI Scripts
UI Pages
UI Macros
Fix Scripts
UI Policies
Script Actions
UI Actions
</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Component verification of installed app</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Verify with count mentioned on installation doc. If found mismatching(spefically count less than mentioned in doc in that case only) reach out to nuvolo technnical engineering team.</remediation><script><![CDATA[// Mobile Platform (x_nuvo_mobile)
// Nuvolo Platform Services (x_nuvo_nps)
// Connected Workplace (x_nuvo_eam)
// Space (x_nuvo_sfm)
var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var scopeApp = [

    {
        "scope": "x_nuvo_sfm",
        "scope_name": "Space"
    },
    {
        "scope": "x_nuvo_eam",
        "scope_name": "Connected workplace"
    },
    {
        "scope": "x_nuvo_mobile",
        "scope_name": "Mobile Platform"
    },
    {
        "scope": "x_nuvo_nps",
        "scope_name": "Nuvolo Platform Services"
    }

];

var components = [{
        "c_class": "Table",
        "class_name": "sys_db_object"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "Business Rule",
        "class_name": "sys_script"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "Client Script",
        "class_name": "sys_script_client"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "Script Include",
        "class_name": "sys_script_include"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "UI Script",
        "class_name": "sys_ui_script"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "UI Page",
        "class_name": "sys_ui_page"
    },
    //{ "class" : "UI Macro", "class_name" : "sys_script"},
    {
        "c_class": "Fix Script",
        "class_name": "sys_script_fix"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "UI Policy",
        "class_name": "sys_ui_policy"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "Script Action",
        "class_name": "sysevent_script_action"
    },
    {
        "c_class": "UI Action",
        "class_name": "sys_ui_action"
    },

];

//gs.info("component==:" + components[0].class);

var noOfApps = Object.keys(scopeApp).length;
var noOfComponents = Object.keys(components).length;

var index = 0;

while (index < noOfApps) {

    var checkApp = new GlideRecord("sys_app");
    checkApp.addQuery("scope", scopeApp[index].scope);
    checkApp.addQuery("active", true);
    checkApp.query();

    if (checkApp.getRowCount()) {
        var scope_name = scopeApp[index].scope;
        //gs.info("Application scope : " + scopeApp[index].scope_name);

        var cindex = 0;
        while (cindex < noOfComponents) {

            var checkComponent = new GlideRecord("sys_metadata");
            checkComponent.addEncodedQuery("sys_class_name=" + components[cindex].class_name + "^sys_scope.scope=" + scope_name);
            checkComponent.query();

            util.handleOutput(components[cindex].c_class + " : " + checkComponent.getRowCount(), 'Information', 'ServiceNow');
            cindex++;

        }

    }

    index++;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Harshal.Sonawane@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-01 09:10:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>d052bd65dbc59d105f598b05059619ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Component verification of installed app</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_d052bd65dbc59d105f598b05059619ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
